languages.text: Какое-то время Лорд-капитан проводит в койке, под неусыпным наблюдением врачей. Где-то там, за перегородками ослепшего и оглохшего корабля, оставшиеся без свое{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы} люди сражаются с неизвестной напастью. На медпалубу все время поступают новые жертвы. Вот мимо сервочерепа проносят молодого парня, правая половина тела которого превратилась в месиво из плоти и костей. Вот тащат бьющуюся в судорогах девушку без челюсти и с обнаженными ребрами... словно осознав бессмысленность своего пребывания здесь, Лорд-капитан требует собрать {mf|его|ее} и помочь встать.

traits.locale_text: Еще какое-то время капитан приходит в себя. Вокруг бегают лекари, за перегородкой слышатся стоны и визг пилы, а рядом укладывают молодого сержанта. Правая часть его тела полностью расплющена и превратилась в месиво из плоти и костей. Лорд-капитан собирается с силами и решает...

languages.text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.
languages.original_text: Какое-то время Лорд-капитан проводит в койке, под неусыпным наблюдением врачей. Где-то там, за перегородками ослепшего и оглохшего корабля, оставшиеся без свое{mf|го|й} повелител{mf|я|ьницы} люди сражаются с неизвестной напастью. На медпалубу все время поступают новые жертвы. languages.text: {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} pasa un tiempo en la cama bajo el atento cuidado de los médicos. Más allá de las mamparas, en el resto de la nave cegada y ensordecida, la gente carece de líder y se enfrenta a una amenaza desconocida. Cada vez llegan más víctimas a la cubierta médica. El servocráneo graba la llegada de un joven cuyo costado derecho es un amasijo de carne y huesos triturados. Después, una mujer a la que le falta la mandíbula y con las costillas al descubierto... {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, dándose cuenta de que no arregla nada allí, ordena que traten sus heridas y que {mf|le|la} ayuden a incorporarse.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

Más allá de las mamparas, en el resto de la nave cegada y ensordecida, la gente carece de líder y se enfrenta a una amenaza desconocida. Cada vez llegan más víctimas a la cubierta médica. El servocráneo graba la llegada de un joven cuyo costado derecho es un amasijo de carne y huesos triturados. Después, una mujer a la que le falta la mandíbula y con las costillas al descubierto... {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, dándose cuenta de que no arregla nada allí, ordena que traten sus heridas y que {mf|le|la} ayuden a incorporarse.

languages.text: 领主舰长在床上躺了一段时间，得到了医生们的精心护理。而在医疗甲板之外，在这艘照明与通讯被完全切断的船上，群龙无首的船员们正在与某个未知的威胁作斗争。不断有新的受害者被送到医疗甲板上，伺服头骨记录了医护人员抬进来一名年轻男子的景象：那个人右半边身体变成了变成了一团混杂在一起的血肉与白骨。随后是一个年轻女人，下巴不知去了哪里，肋骨也翻到了外面……领主舰长似乎意识到，继续呆在这里没有任何意义，于是要求医生们把{mf|他|她}包扎好，帮助{mf|他|她}再次站起来。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长在床上躺了一段时间，得到了医生们的精心护理。而在医疗甲板之外，在这艘照明与通讯被完全切断的船上，群龙无首的船员们正在与某个未知的威胁作斗争。不断有新的受害者被送到医疗甲板上，伺服头骨记录了医护人员抬进来一名年轻男子的景象：那个人右半边身体变成了变成了一团混杂在一起的血肉与白骨。随后是一个年轻女人，下巴不知去了哪里，肋骨也翻到了外面……领主舰长似乎意识到，继续呆在这里没有任何意义，于是要求医生们把{mf|他|她}包扎好，帮助{mf|他|她}再次站起来。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンは医師の行き届いた世話を受け、しばらくの間ベッドの上で過ごしている。目も見えず耳も聞こえず、船の壁の向こうのどこかでリーダーを失った人々が未知の脅威と戦っている。メディケアデッキには新たな犠牲者が次々と運ばれてくる。サーヴォスカルには、医師が右半身の肉と骨がバラバラになった若い男が運び込まれたことが記録される。それから、顎が欠け、肋骨がむき出しになった若い女が現れた…まるでここにいても何もできないと言うように、ロード・キャプテンは、なんとか自分の足を応急処置してくれと要求した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンは医師の行き届いた世話を受け、しばらくの間ベッドの上で過ごしている。目も見えず耳も聞こえず、船の壁の向こうのどこかでリーダーを失った人々が未知の脅威と戦っている。メディケアデッキには新たな犠牲者が次々と運ばれてくる。サーヴォスカルには、医師が右半身の肉と骨がバラバラになった若い男が運び込まれたことが記録される。それから、顎が欠け、肋骨がむき出しになった若い女が現れた…まるでここにいても何もできないと言うように、ロード・キャプテンは、なんとか自分の足を応急処置してくれと要求した。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain verbringt einige Zeit im Bett, in der sorgfältigen Obhut der Ärzte. Irgendwo da draußen, jenseits der Schotten des geblendeten und betäubten Schiffes, kämpfen Menschen, die ohne {mf|ihren Anführer|ihre Anführerin} zurückgelassen wurden, gegen eine unbekannte Bedrohung. Ständig werden neue Opfer auf das Medicae-Deck gebracht. Der Servoschädel zeichnet auf, wie die Sanitäter einen jungen Mann hereintragen, dessen rechte Körperhälfte nur noch aus Fleisch und Knochen besteht. Dann eine junge Frau mit fehlendem Kiefer und entblößten Rippen ... Als ob er die Sinnlosigkeit seines Aufenthalts hier erkennen würde, verlangt der Lord Captain zusammengeflickt zu werden und auf die Beine zu kommen.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine |La seigneure-capitaine} garde le lit quelque temps pendant qu'{mf|il|elle} reçoit les soins méticuleux des médecins. Quelque part, au-delà des cloisons du vaisseau aveuglé et assourdi, des gens privés de chef se battent contre une menace inconnue. Les blessés ne cessent d'affluer au pont medicae. La pictocapture montre les médecins en train de porter un jeune homme dont la moitié droite du corps n'est plus qu'un amas de chair et d'os, puis vient une jeune femme avec la mâchoire arrachée et les côtes à nu... Réalisant {mf|qu'il|qu'elle} ne peut pas rester ici plus longtemps, {name} exige qu'on {mf|le|la} remette sur pied au plus vite.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine |La seigneure-capitaine} garde le lit quelque temps pendant qu'{mf|il|elle} reçoit les soins méticuleux des médecins. Quelque part, au-delà des cloisons du vaisseau aveuglé et assourdi, des gens privés de chef se battent contre une menace inconnue. Les blessés ne cessent d'affluer au pont medicae. La pictocapture montre les médecins en train de porter un jeune homme dont la moitié droite du corps n'est plus qu'un amas de chair et d'os, puis vient une jeune femme avec la mâchoire arrachée et les côtes à nu... Réalisant {mf|qu'il|qu'elle} ne peut pas rester ici plus longtemps, {name} exige qu'on {mf|le|la} remette sur pied au plus vite.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, doktorların özenli bakımı altında yatakta biraz zaman geçiriyor. Lidersiz kalan insanlar; dışarıda bir yerlerde, kör ve sağır geminin bölme panellerinin öte tarafında bilmedikleri bir tehditle savaşıyor. Sıhhiye güvertesine sürekli yeni kurbanlar getiriliyor. Hizmelet, önce vücudunun sağ tarafında et ile kemik birbirine girmiş genç bir adamı taşıyan sıhhiyecileri, sonra da çenesi kayıp, kaburgaları kırık genç bir kadını kaydediyor... Lord Kaptan, burada kalmasının anlamsızlığını fark etmiş gibi yaralarının sarılmasını ve ayağa kaldırılmayı talep ediyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spends some time in bed, in the doctors' meticulous care. Out there somewhere, beyond the bulkheads of the blinded and deafened ship, people who have been left without their leader are fighting against an unknown threat. New victims are constantly being brought to the medicae deck. The servo-skull records medics carrying in a young man, the right side of his body a mess of flesh and bone. Then a young woman with her jaw missing and her ribs bared... as if realising the pointlessness of {mf|his|her} stay here, the Lord Captain demands to be patched up and helped to {mf|his|her} feet.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, doktorların özenli bakımı altında yatakta biraz zaman geçiriyor. Dışarıda bir yerlerde, kör ve sağır geminin bölme panelleri ötesinde, lidersiz kalan insanlar bilmedikleri bir tehdide karşı savaşıyor. Sıhhiye güvertesine sürekli yeni kurbanlar getiriliyor. Hizmelet, vücudunun sağ tarafında et ile kemik birbirine girmiş genç bir adamı taşıyan sıhhiyecileri kaydediyor. Sonra çenesi kayıp, kaburgaları kırık genç bir kadın... Lord Kaptan, burada kalmasının anlamsızlığını fark etmiş gibi yaralarının sarılmasını ve ayağa kaldırılmayı talep ediyor.
